content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Hello Mr. Wang, I'm glad you're interested in the apartment. I must say, it's a great place, and I'm sure you'll love living here. The rental market in München is quite competitive, but considering the prime location and the quality of the apartment, I was thinking of a price around €1,200 per month.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That's a quite high price for an unfurnished apartment. I am a student and I am on a tight budget. I am willing to pay €800 per month.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I understand your situation, Mr. Wang, but €800 is quite low for this apartment, considering its location and quality. I'm sure you'll find many amenities nearby that justify a higher price. I'm willing to negotiate, but I can't go as low as €800.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I appreciate that, Mr. Schmidt. Considering the apartment's location and quality, I am willing to increase my offer. I am willing to pay €900 per month for the apartment.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: That's a better offer, Mr. Wang, but considering the current market situation and the quality of the apartment, I think we can do better. I'm willing to negotiate, but I can't accept €900 just yet.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Understandable, Mr. Schmidt. I am willing to pay €1,000 per month for the apartment.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: That's a fair offer, Mr. Wang, but considering the market situation and the quality of the apartment, I think we can do a bit better. I'm willing to negotiate, but I can't accept €1,000 just yet.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand, Mr. Schmidt. I am willing to pay €1,100 per month for the apartment.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: That's a reasonable offer, Mr. Wang, but considering the market situation and the quality of the apartment, I think we can do a bit better. I'm willing to negotiate, but I can't accept €1,100 just yet.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand, Mr. Schmidt. I am willing to pay €1,150 per month for the apartment.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: That's a good offer, Mr. Wang, but considering the market situation and the quality of the apartment, I think we can do a bit better. I'm willing to negotiate, but I can't accept €1,150 just yet.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand, Mr. Schmidt. I am willing to pay €1,175 per month for the apartment.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: That's a fair offer, Mr. Wang, but considering the market situation and the quality of the apartment, I think we can do a bit better. I'm willing to negotiate, but I can't accept €1,175 just yet.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand, Mr. Schmidt. I am willing to pay €1,200 per month for the apartment.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I agree to the price of [1200] Euro!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
